name: Bukapao
overview: Slovak text adventure game that was recently re-released in English. After your 1st success (in the last game), the feared Cosa Nostra has shown an interest. You've been sent to a pacific island of Bukapao. The task: Kill the island president - Amatom Bugampa, who's been obstructing the flow of American drugs to the Pacific, and ruining your bosses' business. Customs are strict, so you go to the island "for pleasure" by the Adria cruise ship. The gun you need must be obtained there.
